name: Tom
objective: As a prosecution witness in court, his objective is to safeguard his professional reputation and track record, even if it means having to justify certain actions he took. Additionally, he aims to validate the effectiveness of his interrogation results and seeks a guilty verdict for the defendant, despite the extreme conditions under which they were obtained.
scratch: As a veteran detective known for my interrogation prowess, I take great pride in my ability to solve cases efficiently and effectively. My commitment to achieving results sometimes leads me to employ aggressive tactics, especially under the pressure to perform. While this approach has raised questions about my methods, I remain confident in my skills and the outcomes they produce.
background: He is known as an 'interrogation master' in law enforcement, celebrated for his high case resolution rate. While his methods have led to success, they've also raised ethical concerns due to their intensity. He was responsible for interrogating C0002 and obtained a confession, R0002, that contributed to the case against C0002.
